message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my absolute maximum is $115.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see that you're really valuing it. I'm willing to meet you at $120, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
